scripts.build: bundle exec jekyll build && subfont build/index.html --inline-css -i
scripts.postbuild: buildProduction --canonicalroot https://mntr.dk/ --outroot dist build/index.html build/wishlist/index.html build/font-demo/index.html --sharedbundles --asyncscripts --optimizeimages --sourcemaps --sourcescontent --subresourceintegrity --contentsecuritypolicy && cp src/_headers dist/ && node tools/netlify-headers.js >> dist/_headers
